description: Updated for Spring 2023 with the convenience of hand pockets.Durable,l ightweight storm protection with Diamond Fuse technology and 360 degree reflectivity protects you on the mountain and in the city. <br><br>One jacket to rule them all, as seen in Outside Magazine. Tested, trusted, and top-selling since 2010, the iconic Helium Rain Jacket, packs down to the size of your palm and utilizes the left-hand pocket as a stuff sack, so you'll always have room for it in your pack or work bag. Made from BlueSign® approved Pertex® Shield Diamond Fuse Nylon, a fabric that offers excellent durability and abrasion resistance, you can venture off-trail or squeeze onto a crowded train with confidence. Mother Nature can do her worst while you stay comfortable and dry with Aquaguard zippers, elastic cuffs, drawcord hems, an adjustable hood, and zippered hand pockets.
name: Helium Rain Jacket, Plus - Womens
